features: Deliciously thick and rich maple syrup
80% fewer calories than original syrup, 0g of sugar per serving
Pancakes just aren't the same without it
Perfect way to get the day started off on the right foot
description: Delighting families since 1961, the iconic bottle isn’t the only reason Mrs. Butterworth’s has long been a family favorite. Known for her delicious, buttery taste and slow pour, Mrs. Butterworth’s syrups help make breakfast into mouth-watering fun. For over 50 years, Mrs. Butterworth’s has been offering America’s favorite breakfast selections and is popular with kids and adults alike – a true American icon. Whatever variety you choose, you will be sure to enjoy her thick and rich syrups, and her delectable pancake and waffle mixes. Turn any table into the family breakfast table. Enjoy the thick, rich, and buttery taste of Mrs. Butterworth's syrup in Original, Lite, and Sugar Free varieties. Great on pancakes, waffles or as a topping for oatmeal. Mrs. Butterworth’s Sugar Free syrup contains 80% fewer calories than original syrup and 0g of sugar per serving so you can enjoy your pancakes guilt free. Mrs. Butterworth's Sugar Free Syrup has that iconic maple flavor you have come to expect from Mrs. Butterworth's Syrups.
